data.title: Great Falls Tribune
data.meta_description: Final results from State B, State C golf tournaments
data.text:
State’s top performances

By Jeff Hedstrom

montanatrack.com representative

These lists are event leaders from Montana high schools from around the state from times that were compiled from the results and the deep lists that were entered into the montanatrack.com website. The all-class state records are in parentheses. The times for the running events were timed out to the hundredths of a second, but .24 seconds were added to the times at the hand-timed meets.

BOYS

100 meters (10.67) – Remington Hjelvik, Biilings West 11.00; Connor Murnion, Jordan 11.03; Michael Gulledge, Billings Central 11.06; Dalton Daum, Butte 11.07; David Keena, Manhattan Christian 11.11; Jacob Kleinhans, Bozeman 11.12; Braden Rykal, Boulder 11.14; Gabe Sulser, Billings Senior 11.15; Nick VanHorssen, Helena 11.17; Kyle Crossman, Hamilton 11.18; Stephan Not Afraid, Hardin 11.19; Brendan Atchison, Billings Skyview 11.20; Sam Kirkeide, Missoula Big Sky 11.20
